given.text:
Vladimir is a very hard working and enthusiastic person. I had the opportunity to work with him for a very important application in UBS. He gives his 100% in whatever he takes up and is always willing to help out others too. He created a very friendly working environment and made sure the collaboration between the development and QA team was very smooth. I wish him all the best in his future endeavors.
…
See more
Vladimir consistently produced high quality work in a complex, high-pressure environment for our client, for which we received strong feedback. I would not hesitate to recommend his services.

received.text:
I had pleasure to utilize Robin's infrastructure libraries namely multi index cache API and many other cool and well designed structures and algorithms.
Robin is a real pro when it comes to C++ , C++11 , UNIX OS. I am so lucky I had a chance to read his solutions , it made me a much better programmer and basically inspired me to learn meta-programming and other advance features of C++ .
I have only met 3 people of his caliber in my entire career. Highly recommend for 
Robin for any project.

I have worked with Soheb on several occasions , he performed quality assurance work in my project, some of what was functional and non-functional testing of our product. He is a one of a kind Test Analyst who strives for perfection and achieves it by applying his best knowledge
and persistence. His vast knowledge of all applications withing the Bank
was extremely helpful for us in understanding where the problem have actually occurred.  He has a neat appearance, he is methodical and polite . I would highly recommend him to anyone looking for high quality Analysts.

items: Code Generators and Extensions for VanillaRTB stack
VanillaRTB - Real Time Bidding (RTB) - Demand Side Platform framework
multi platform cross language multi index cache ( a.k.a MPCLMI CACHE )
